h=(a.lang.rtl===!0?-1:1)*e.angle;return{transform:e.reverse!==(a.lang.rtl===!0)?`scale3d(-1, 1, 1) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, ${-90-h}deg)`:`rotate3d(0, 0, 1, ${h-90}deg)`}}),l=v(()=>e.instantFeedback!==!0&&e.indeterminate!==!0?{transition:`stroke-dashoffset ${e.animationSpeed}ms ease 0s, stroke ${e.animationSpeed}ms ease`}:""),m=v(()=>lt/(1-e.thickness/2)),p=v(()=>`${m.value/2} ${m.value/2} ${m.value} ${m.value}`),f=v(()=>te(e.value,e.min,e.max)),$=v(()=>e.max-e.min),r=v(()=>e.thickness/2*m.value),q=v(()=>{const h=(e.max-f.value)/$.value,_=e.rounded===!0&&f.value<e.max&&h<.25?r.value/2*(1-h/.25):0;return it*h+_});function x({thickness:h,offset:_,color:A,cls:D,rounded:S}){return O("circle",{class:"q-circular-progress__"+D+(A!==void 0?` text-${A}`:""),style:l.value,fill:"transparent",stroke:"currentColor","stroke-width":h,"stroke-dasharray":Vs,"stroke-dashoffset":_,"stroke-linecap":S,cx:m.value,cy:m.value,r:Ce})}return()=>{const h=[];e.centerColor!==void 0&&e.centerColor!=="transparent"&&h.push(O("circle",{class:`q-circular-progress__center text-${e.centerColor}`,fill:"currentColor",r:Ce-r.value/2,cx:m.value,cy:m.value})),e.trackColor!==void 0&&e.trackColor!=="transparent"&&h.push(x({cls:"track",thickness:r.value,offset:0,color:e.trackColor})),h.push(x({cls:"circle",thickness:r.value,offset:q.value,color:e.color,rounded:e.rounded===!0?"round":void 0}));const _=[O("svg",{class:"q-circular-progress__svg",style:s.value,viewBox:p.value,"aria-hidden":"true"},h)];return e.showValue===!0&&_.push(O("div",{class:"q-circular-progress__text absolute-full row flex-center content-center",style:{fontSize:e.fontSize}},t.default!==void 0?t.default():[O("div",f.value)])),O("div",{class:`q-circular-progress q-circular-progress--${e.indeterminate===!0?"in":""}determinate`,style:n.value,role:"progressbar","aria-valuemin":e.min,"aria-valuemax":e.max,"aria-valuenow":e.indeterminate===!0?void 0:f.value},Ft(t.internal,_))}}});/*! vue-countdown v2.1.0 | (c) 2018-present Chen Fengyuan | MIT */const ue=1e3,ce=60*ue,de=60*ce,Pe=24*de,Fe="abort",Re="end",je="progress",He="start",We="visibilitychange";var Ls=Zt({name:"VueCountdown",props:{autoStart:{type:Boolean,default:!0},emitEvents:{type:Boolean,default:!0},interval:{type:Number,default:1e3,validator:e=>e>=0},now:{type:Function,default:()=>Date.now()},tag:{type:String,default:"span"},time:{type:Number,default:0,validator:e=>e>=0},transform:{type:Function,default:e=>e}},emits:[Fe,Re,je,He],data(){return{counting:!1,endTime:0,totalMilliseconds:0,requestId:0}},computed:{days(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds/Pe)},hours(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds%Pe/de)},minutes(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds%de/ce)},seconds(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds%ce/ue)},milliseconds(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds%ue)},totalDays(){return this.days},totalHours(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds/de)},totalMinutes(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds/ce)},totalSeconds(){return Math.floor(this.totalMilliseconds/ue)}},watch:{$props:{deep:!0,immediate:!0,handler(){this.totalMilliseconds=this.time,this.endTime=this.now()+this.time,this.autoStart&&this.start()}}},mounted(){document.addEventListener(We,this.handleVisibilityChange)},beforeUnmount(){document.removeEventListener(We,this.handleVisibilityChange),this.pause()},methods:{start(){this.counting||(this.counting=!0,this.emitEvents&&this.$emit(He),document.visibilityState==="visible"&&this.continue())},continue(){if(!this.counting)return;const e=Math.min(this.totalMilliseconds,this.interval);if(e>0){let t,a;const n=s=>{t||(t=s),a||(a=s);const l=s-t;l>=e||l+(s-a)/2>=e?this.progress():this.requestId=requestAnimationFrame(n),a=s};this.requestId=requestAnimationFrame(n)}else this.end()},pause(){cancelAnimationFrame(this.requestId)},progress(){this.counting&&(this.totalMilliseconds-=this.interval,this.emitEvents&&this.totalMilliseconds>0&&this.$emit(je,{days:this.days,hours:this.hours,minutes:this.minutes,seconds:this.seconds,milliseconds:this.milliseconds,totalDays:this.totalDays,totalHours:this.totalHours,totalMinutes:this.totalMinutes,totalSeconds:this.totalSeconds,totalMilliseconds:this.totalMilliseconds}),this.continue())},abort(){this.counting&&(this.pause(),this.counting=!1,this.emitEvents&&this.$emit(Fe))},end(){this.counting&&(this.pause(),this.totalMilliseconds=0,this.counting=!1,this.emitEvents&&this.$emit(Re))},update(){this.counting&&(this.totalMilliseconds=Math.max(0,this.endTime-this.now()))},restart(){this.pause(),this.totalMilliseconds=this.time,this.endTime=this.now()+this.time,this.counting=!1,this.start()},handleVisibilityChange(){switch(document.visibilityState){case"visible":this.update(),this.continue();break;case"hidden":this.pause();break}}},render(){return O(this.tag,this.$slots.default?[this.$slots.default(this.transform({days:this.days,hours:this.hours,minutes:this.minutes,seconds:this.seconds,milliseconds:this.milliseconds,totalDays:this.totalDays,totalHours:this.totalHours,totalMinutes:this.totalMinutes,totalSeconds:this.totalSeconds,totalMilliseconds:this.totalMilliseconds}))]:void 0)}});const Ns={__name:"LiveCart",setup(e){const t=Ze(),a=L(),n=Xe(),s=Q(),l=F(),m=W(),{open:p}=oe(),f=E(!1),$=v(()=>Number(n.liveBetDelay*0));async function r(){p({title:"배팅을 진행 하시겠습니까?"}).onOk(async()=>{$.value>0&&(f.value=!0,await Ht($.value),f.value=!1),q()})}async function q(){a.submitting=!0;const p=t.items.filter((f,$)=>$<6).map(f=>f.ball);await ne.post("duotone-ball-bets",{duotone_ball_id:t.items[0].duotoneBall.id,amount:t.amount,balls:p}).then(()=>{t.$reset()}).finally(()=>{t.submitting=!1}),await a.fetch(),s.screen.lt.md&&(n.rightDrawerOpen=!1)})}return(p,f)=>(u(),C(X,{onSubmit:m},{item:k($=>[c(dn,{data:$},null,8,["data"])]),_:1}))}},fn="/assets/telegram-3398065a.png",vn=["href"],hn=["src"],_n={__name:"Telegram",setup(e){const{telegramUrl:t}=qe();return(a,n)=>(u(),y("a",{href:d(t),target:"_blank",class:"w-full"},[i("img",{src:d(fn),alt:"telegram",class:"w-full"},null,8,hn)],8,vn))}},gn="/assets/telegram2-439a046d.png",pn=["href"],bn=["src"],yn={__name:"Telegram2",setup(e){const{telegram2Url:t}=qe();return(a,n)=>(u(),y("a",{href:d(t),target:"_blank",class:"w-full"},[i("img",{src:d(gn),alt:"telegram",class:"w-full"},null,8,bn)],8,pn))}},wn="/assets/forever-domain-c2477a21.png",$n=["href"],kn=["src"],xn={__name:"ForeverDomain",setup(e){const{foreverDomainUrl:t}=qe();return(a,n)=>(u(),y("a",{href:d(t),target:"_blank",class:"w-full"},[i("img",{src:d(wn),alt:"kakao-talk",class:"w-full"},null,8,kn)],8,$n))}},Sn={class:"mt-2 flex flex-col gap-2"},Hn={__name:"RightDrawer",setup(e){const t=W(),a=F();return fe(()=>t.screen.lt.lg,()=>{a.rightDrawerOpen=!1},{immediate:!0}),fe(()=>t.screen.gt.md,()=>{a.rightDrawerOpen=!0},{immediate:!0}),(n,s)=>(u(),C(nt,{"model-value":!0,mini:!d(a).rightDrawerOpen,side:"right",persistent:"","no-swipe-open":"","no-swipe-close":"","no-swipe-backdrop":"",width:250,"mini-width":0,behavior:"desktop",overlay:d(t).screen.lt.md,class:"right-drawer"},{default:k(()=>[c(me,{name:"shopping_cart",class:"right-drawer-toggle",onClick:s[0]||(s[0]=l=>d(a).toggleRightDrawer())}),c(st,{class:"h-full w-full","content-style":{width:"100%"}},{default:k(()=>[n.$route.name.includes("pregames")||n.$route.name.includes("prematches")?(u(),C(Os,{key:0})):n.$route.name.includes("lives")?(u(),C(Ns,{key:1})):n.$route.name.includes("mini-games")?(u(),C(Us,{key:2})):n.$route.name.includes("virtual-games")?(u(),C(ln,{key:3})):n.$route.name.includes("duotone-balls")?(u(),C(mn,{key:4})):(u(),C(X,{key:5})),i("div",Sn,[c(_n),c(xn),c(yn)])]),_:1})]),_:1},8,["mini","overlay"]))}};export{Rn as _,jn as a,Hn as b};
//# sourceMappingURL=layout-6e051b6e.js.map
